forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing for the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain. High 57F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
